definitions.title: n. [m.]
definitions.body: si vera l., thickness, compactness;—[[בְּמַעֲבֵה הָאֲדָמָה]] 1Ki 7:46 in the compactness of the soil, i.e. clayey ground or clay mould = 2Ch 4:17 (where MT ´[[בַּעֲבִי הָ]]); but read doubtless in both [[בְּמַעְבֶּרֶת אֲדָמָה]] at the ford of Adamah, v. GFM:Ju 7, 22 Benz:K.
